name: Zero Tales - Game Final
description:
Zero Tales - Game Final. Final version of the game, might add or improve things in the future.

Movement - A and D keys to move left and right, press space to jump.

Attack - Hold left click for quick normal attacks, Hold right click to use special attacks/block attacks.

Characters - Knight, Archer and Mage.

Knight

Health - 120

Mana - 0 

Hold left click - Uses a quick slashing attack

Hold right click - Blocks enemy attacks, if enemy is too weak, blocking completely negates damage.

Knight has no mana at all and cannot perform special attacks but is the only character in the game currently that can block enemy attacks.

high defense and generally good for newer players to use.

Archer

Health - 100

Mana - 50

Hold left click - shoots a single arrow 

Hold right click - uses 10 mana and fires 3 arrows in a cone shape in front of the character. Can be used like a shotgun.

Mana slowly regenerates after player stands still and does nothing.

Archer class is high in mobility and fast attacks and can perform double jump, generally used for rushing the game.

Mage

Health - 75

Mana - 200

Hold left click - summons a lighting splash from the ground in front of the character.

Hold right click - summons lighting that does massive damage to enemies in front of the character.

Mana quickly regenerates after player stands still and does nothing.

Mage class is highest in damage but lowest in defense, make sure when casting spells do it from afar as casting takes quite some time.
